title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       The links in this section can help educators plan field trips, create lesson plans, and find activities that relate to Fredercia and Colonial Georgia.           Plan a Field Trip: Get information about programs, facilities, and safety.          Movie Trailer provided by Marc & Doris Cramer.   Preview our new park film: "Fort Frederica: History Uncovered". The film is shown in the visitor center every 30 minutes from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm.  A full length DVD can be purchased through our bookstore.
